title: E minor part writing V of iv HC

content.question: Question 6.Write the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the Roman and Arabic numerals. Use only quarter and half notes.

frqParts.text: Question 6.Write the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the Roman and Arabic numerals. Use only quarter and half notes.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase
